WorkItem.Description:
The value of necrotic_touch is exported as 0 even when a Black Bruise is equipped.
 
This line in the EnhSim.cs file seems to be in error:
 
 sb.AppendLine("necrotic_touch                  " + (character.MainHand.Id == 30035 ? "1" : "0"));
 
The proper item number for Black Bruise (iLevel 264) is 50035.
WorkItem.Summary: [Enhance] Necrotic Touch not exported to EnhSim
